description.zh-cn: 满族姓氏，位列满族八大姓之一。可追溯至女真通用三十姓之一的蒲察氏，金朝时期为女真姓氏第二位，与完颜氏世为婚姻。
description.en: A Manchu clan, one of the Eight Great Manchu Clans. It can be traced back to the Pucha clan, one of the thirty common Jurchen surnames. During the Jin dynasty, it was the second most prominent Jurchen surname and had intermarriage relations with the Wanyan clan for generations.

description.zh-cn: 女真族的一个氏族，建立了金朝。
description.en: A Jurchen clan that founded the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由女真首领努尔哈赤建立的政权，清朝的前身。
description.en: A dynasty established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci, the predecessor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏沙济地方人，清朝初期人物，其家族在清代最为显赫。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan from Shaji, a prominent figure in the early Qing dynasty whose family became the most illustrious branch of the clan.

description.zh-cn: 后金的建立者，清朝的奠基人。
description.en: The founder of the Later Jin dynasty and the founding father of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 旺吉努之孙，历任内大臣、内务府总管兼佐领，封一等男。
description.en: Grandson of Wangginu, served as Grand Minister of the Imperial Household, General Manager of the Imperial Household Department, and Captain. Ennobled as a First-Class Baron.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，清朝入关后的首位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty and the first Qing emperor to rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 哈什屯之子，官至尚书。
description.en: Son of Hašitun, served as a Minister (Shangshu).

description.zh-cn: 米思翰之子，孝贤纯皇后和傅恒之父。
description.en: Son of Mishan, father of Empress Xiaoxianchun and Fuheng.

description.zh-cn: 米思翰之子，清朝大学士。
description.en: Son of Mishan, a Grand Secretary of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝原配妻子、清高宗孝贤纯皇后，李荣保之女。
description.en: The first empress consort of the Qianlong Emperor, daughter of Lirongbao.

description.zh-cn: 富文之子，晋封承恩毅勇公，在清缅战争中兵败自缢。
description.en: Son of Fuwen, ennobled as Duke Chengen Yiyong. He committed suicide after being defeated in the Sino-Burmese War.

description.zh-cn: 清朝和缅甸贡榜王朝之间的一场战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Qing dynasty of China and the Konbaung dynasty of Burma.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏成员，咸丰帝顾命八大臣之一。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan and one of the eight regents appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝临终前任命的八位辅佐同治帝的赞襄政务大臣。
description.en: A group of eight officials appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor on his deathbed to assist the succeeding Tongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第九位皇帝。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 李荣保之子，官至保和殿大学士，因平定金川、缅甸战功封一等忠勇公。
description.en: Son of Lirongbao, served as a Grand Secretary of the Baohe Hall. He was ennobled as a First-Class Duke Zhongyong for his military achievements in the Jinchuan and Burmese campaigns.

en: Grand Secretary of the Baohe Hall

description.zh-cn: 清朝内阁大学士之一，为文臣最高职位。
description.en: One of the Grand Secretaries of the Cabinet in the Qing dynasty, the highest position for a civil official.

description.zh-cn: 清代乾隆年间，清军对四川大小金川地区的嘉绒人土司进行的两次大规模征剿。
description.en: Two large-scale military campaigns launched by the Qing army against the Gyalrong chieftains in the Greater and Lesser Jinchuan regions of Sichuan during the Qianlong era.

description.zh-cn: 傅恒之子，因金川、台湾、廓尔喀等战功追赠嘉勇郡王。
description.en: Son of Fuheng, posthumously created Prince Jiayong of the Second Rank for his military achievements in the Jinchuan, Taiwan, and Gurkha campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 清朝乾隆年间在台湾发生的一次大规模民变。
description.en: A major popular uprising that occurred in Taiwan during the Qianlong era of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与尼泊尔之间的一场战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Qing dynasty and Nepal.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏成员，在王辅臣兵变中阵亡。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan who was killed in action during the Rebellion of Wang Fuchen.

description.zh-cn: 三藩之乱期间，清朝平凉提督王辅臣发动的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion launched by Wang Fuchen, the Qing military commander of Pingliang, during the Revolt of the Three Feudatories.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏成员，因在缅甸擒获永历帝有功，优授三等男。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan, ennobled as a Third-Class Baron for his merit in capturing the Yongli Emperor in Burma.

description.zh-cn: 南明第四位也是最后一位皇帝。
description.en: The fourth and last emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 蜚悠城城主，因不堪布占泰压迫而归附努尔哈赤。
description.en: Lord of Feiyou City, who submitted to Nurhaci due to the oppression of Bujantai.

description.zh-cn: 海西女真乌拉部末代贝勒。
description.en: The last Beile (prince) of the Ula tribe of the Haixi Jurchens.

description.zh-cn: 建州女真与乌拉部之间的一场重要战役。
description.en: A significant battle between the Jianzhou Jurchens and the Ula tribe.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏成员，官至武英殿大学士兼工部尚书。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan who served as a Grand Secretary of the Wuying Hall and Minister of Works.

en: Grand Secretary of the Wuying Hall

description.zh-cn: 清朝内阁大学士之一，为文臣最高职位。
description.en: One of the Grand Secretaries of the Cabinet in the Qing dynasty, the highest position for a civil official.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏成员，官至保和殿大学士。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan who served as a Grand Secretary of the Baohe Hall.

description.zh-cn: 康熙朝重臣，历任武英殿大学士兼吏部尚书。
description.en: An important minister during the Kangxi era, who served as a Grand Secretary of the Wuying Hall and Minister of Personnel.

description.zh-cn: 阿兰泰之子，历任大学士、靖逆将军，击退准噶尔大汗策妄阿拉布坦。
description.en: Son of Alantai, served as a Grand Secretary and General Jingni, repelled the Dzungar Khan Tsewang Rabtan.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国大汗。
description.en: Khan of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏成员，官至黑龙江将军，曾率清军出征雅克萨之战。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan who served as the General of Heilongjiang and commanded Qing forces in the Battle of Yakesa.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与沙皇俄国在雅克萨（今俄罗斯阿尔巴济诺）发生的一系列军事冲突。
description.en: A series of military conflicts between the Qing dynasty and Tsarist Russia at Yakesa (modern Albazino, Russia).

description.zh-cn: 旺吉努长子，哈什屯之父。
description.en: Eldest son of Wangginu and father of Hašitun.

description.zh-cn: 李荣保第四子，明瑞之父。
description.en: Fourth son of Lirongbao and father of Mingrui.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏成员，安达理与尼喀那之父。
description.en: A member of the Fuca clan, father of Andali and Nikana.

description.zh-cn: 殷达瑚齐次子，阿兰泰之父。
description.en: Second son of Yindahūci and father of Alantai.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏（蒲察氏）在金朝时期与完颜氏世代为婚姻关系。
description.en: During the Jin dynasty, the Fuca (Pucha) clan had intermarriage relations with the Wanyan clan for generations.

description.zh-cn: 富察氏各支系于后金崛起时相继归附。
description.en: Various branches of the Fuca clan successively submitted to the Later Jin during its rise.

description.zh-cn: 旺吉努早年率领其族众部属归附清太祖努尔哈赤。
description.en: In his early years, Wangginu led his clan members and subordinates to submit to Nurhaci, the founder of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 哈什屯由顺治帝特恩屡次晋封至一等男兼一云骑尉。
description.en: Hašitun was repeatedly promoted by special grace of the Shunzhi Emperor to the rank of First-Class Baron and Yiyunqiwei.

description.zh-cn: 孝贤纯皇后是李荣保之女。
description.en: Empress Xiaoxianchun was the daughter of Lirongbao.

description.zh-cn: 傅恒是李荣保的第十子。
description.en: Fuheng was the tenth son of Lirongbao.

description.zh-cn: 明瑞在清缅战争中兵败后自缢身亡。
description.en: Mingrui was defeated in the Sino-Burmese War and committed suicide.

description.zh-cn: 景寿是咸丰帝任命的顾命八大臣之一。
description.en: Jingshou was one of the eight regents appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 顾命八大臣由咸丰帝在临终前任命，以辅佐其子同治帝。
description.en: The Eight Regent Ministers were appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor on his deathbed to assist his son, the Tongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 傅恒因平定大小金川之役的战功被封为一等忠勇公。
description.en: Fuheng was ennobled as a First-Class Duke Zhongyong for his military achievements in quelling the Jinchuan campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 福康安是傅恒的第三子。
description.en: Fuk'anggan was the third son of Fuheng.

description.zh-cn: 福康安因平定林爽文事件等战功，被追赠为嘉勇郡王。
description.en: Fuk'anggan was posthumously created Prince Jiayong of the Second Rank for his military merits, including the suppression of the Lin Shuangwen rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 福康安因廓尔喀之役等战功，被追赠为嘉勇郡王。
description.en: Fuk'anggan was posthumously created Prince Jiayong of the Second Rank for his military merits, including his role in the Sino-Nepalese War.

description.zh-cn: 萨哈连在王辅臣兵变中阵亡。
description.en: Sahaliyan was killed in action during the Rebellion of Wang Fuchen.

description.zh-cn: 费雅思哈因在缅甸擒获南明永历帝有功而获得封赏。
description.en: Fiyasha was rewarded for his merit in capturing the Southern Ming Yongli Emperor in Burma.

description.zh-cn: 策穆特赫因不堪忍受乌拉贝勒布占泰的压迫而率众归附努尔哈赤。
description.en: Cemtehe, unable to bear the oppression of the Ula Beile Bujantai, led his people to submit to Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 蜚悠城城主策穆特赫请求归附建州努尔哈赤。
description.en: Cemtehe, the lord of Feiyou City, requested to submit to Nurhaci of Jianzhou.

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤派兵迎接策穆特赫途中与乌拉兵遭遇，引发了乌碣岩之战。
description.en: Nurhaci dispatched troops to welcome Cemtehe, which led to an encounter with Ula forces and triggered the Battle of Wujieyan.

description.zh-cn: 富宁安是阿兰泰之子。
description.en: Funinggan was the son of Alantai.

description.zh-cn: 富宁安被授为靖逆将军，成功击退了准噶尔大汗策妄阿拉布坦的进攻。
description.en: Funinggan was appointed General Jingni and successfully repelled the attack of the Dzungar Khan Tsewang Rabtan.

description.zh-cn: 萨布素因雅克萨之战的战功被授予一等轻车都尉。
description.en: Sabsu was awarded the title of First-Class Lieutenant Colonel (Yideng Qingche Duwei) for his military achievements in the Battle of Yakesa.

description.zh-cn: 万济哈是旺吉努的长子。
description.en: Wanjihan was the eldest son of Wangginu.

description.zh-cn: 哈什屯是万济哈的长子。
description.en: Hašitun was the eldest son of Wanjihan.

description.zh-cn: 米思翰是哈什屯之子。
description.en: Mishan was the son of Hašitun.

description.zh-cn: 李荣保是米思翰的第四子。
description.en: Lirongbao was the fourth son of Mishan.

description.zh-cn: 马齐是米思翰之子。
description.en: Macai was the son of Mishan.

description.zh-cn: 明瑞是富文之子。
description.en: Mingrui was the son of Fuwen.

description.zh-cn: 富文是李荣保第四子。
description.en: Fuwen was the fourth son of Lirongbao.

description.zh-cn: 安达理是殷达瑚齐的次子。
description.en: Andali was the second son of Yindahūci.

description.zh-cn: 阿兰泰是安达理之子。
description.en: Alantai was the son of Andali.
